dict.acceptation: 接近地；紧密地；严密地；亲近地；

sent.orig: Closely observes closely Geng Haoshi in them, the unprincipled person actually sneaks off from their eyelid.
sent.trans: 在他们紧紧盯住耿浩时，坏人却从他们眼皮底下溜走。

sent.orig: You can be assured the matter will be closely investigated and the necessary remedial actions taken.
sent.trans: 你可能是确实的物质将会被接近地调查和被拿的必需治疗的行动。

sent.orig: The road runs though a beautiful wooded valley, and the railway line follows it closely.
sent.trans: 公路穿过一个遍布林木的美丽山谷，铁路线在不远处与之相随。

sent.orig: Hou Yongjin is holding these 1000 yuan of remit money closely, the eye is wet.
sent.trans: 侯永进紧攥着这1000元汇款，眼睛湿润了。

sent.orig: The topology of multiplier, which related with physical implementation closely, also advancedrapidly.
sent.trans: 与此同时，与物理实现紧密相关的乘法器拓扑结构的研究也硕果累累。
